sentences: Artur Runge-Metzger outlined the EUs progress in achieving the Kyoto targets, stressing its emphasis on cost-effective policies, a multi-stakeholder approach, and the use of market-based instruments, regulations and standards, labeling and voluntary measures.
He reported on the EUs Emissions Trading Scheme (ETS), which allows linking with Joint Implementation (JI) and the CDM.
He also noted work on the aviation sector, carbon capture and storage, and adaptation.
